title: [OV] White-List bug
body:
Ok, there is a problem with White-List in mumble-1.2.4-165-g5b9e899 snapshot (and above*). If mumble is set to use White-List ov does not work on first run to enable white-list you must switch to black-list (maybe running a game is required at this point) and switch again to white-list.


*I will edit it if not valid


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1053/ .
